statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

article.headline: St. Bonaventure handles Richmond 84-70
article.story: ST. BONAVENTURE, N.Y. -- Matthew Wright scored 20 points and Youssou Ndoye had 19 as St. Bonaventure opened Atlantic-10 play with an 84-70 win over Richmond on Wednesday. Wright hit 7 of 12 shots while Ndoye made 11 of 17 free throws and grabbed 11 rebounds. Andel Cumberbatch had 12 points and Jordan Gathers contributed 11 off the bench for the Bonnies (11-4), who made 27 of 39 free throws. Cedrick Lindsay led Richmond (10-6) with 27 points. The Spiders, who fell behind 40-27 at halftime, only made 13 of 26 free throws. Trey Davis had a career-high 14 rebounds. Wright had 5 of 9 points for the Bonnies after Richmond took a 14-13 lead. He had 5 more points in what became at 17-3 run for a 30-17 lead. Richmond took a 57-55 lead on a Trey Davis layup at 9:03 but Wright tied it with a layup to start a 9-0 surge.
